hero.title: Juats
hero.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas. I create beautiful, performant, and accessible experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer with a degree in Computer Science, experienced in high-impact products, leading front-end initiatives and delivering end-to-end solutions.

bio.paragraph: Full-stack developer with over three years of experience, graduated in Computer Science from the Federal University of Pelotas. I work from the front-end to the back-end, participating from defining the architecture to supporting solutions, always focusing on scalability, code quality, accessibility, and high performance. I have experience leading front-end initiatives, structuring systems to support millions of interactions, building secure and scalable APIs, and delivering products that balance technical excellence with a seamless user experience.

experience1.title: Front-End Technical Lead
experience1.description: Leadership in front-end restructuring, ensuring scalability, performance and efficiency at scale. Development and improvement of the user support screen, optimizing the experience to handle more than 5,000,000 monthly chats in a fluid and responsive way.

experience2.title: Front-End Developer
experience2.description: Architecture definition and strategic technology choices, ensuring a robust, scalable and business-aligned foundation. Coordination of the administrative dashboard front-end team, promoting development best practices.

experience3.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
experience3.description: Participation from architecture definition to solution maintenance, ensuring robustness, scalability and alignment with business objectives. Implementation of end-to-end new features (front-end and back-end), delivering high-quality, secure and performant code.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.subtitle: Technologies and tools I use to create robust and scalable solutions

descriptions.letralandia: Educational app for children's literacy, featuring 3 interactive games, parent area with detailed feedback, and dedicated alphabet learning section.
descriptions.suite: Administrative dashboard integrated with omnichannel customer service area, developed for call centers and customer support with modern and intuitive interface.
descriptions.meupassApp: Mobile-first app for selling products and services, with special focus on promotional offers and optimized shopping experience.
descriptions.meupassDash: Complete administrative dashboard for managing stores in the Meupass app, including inventory control, sales, and analytics.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and projects. Let's work together to create something!
